DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant female , 1875 year age , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20.0 < 35 kg/m² screening ( visit 1 ) . Willing maintain habitual diet , physical activity pattern , body weight throughout trial refrain smoking 12hr prior visit . Willing maintain current dietary supplement use throughout trial . On test day , subject agrees take dietary supplement dismissal GI lab . Failure comply result reschedule test visit . Normal fast serum glucose ( < 7.0mmol/L capillary correspond whole blood glucose < 6.3mmol/L ) . Willing abstain alcohol consumption avoid vigorous physical activity 24 h prior test visit .
